summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Lot 2 of City of Lake Forest Park Short Plat No. 87-39, being a portion of Lot 3, Block 2, North Side Five Acre Tracts; All of the vacated alley within Block 13, Addition to the Town of Seattle as laid out on the claims of C.D. Boren's and A.A. Denny and H.L. Yesler; the northwesterly 16 feet, as measured at right angles to the north westerly line of Lot 1, Block 22, Lake Forest Park 3rd Addition; the north 25 feet of Lots 1, 2, and 3 survey recorded under King County Recording \#7408140546; that portion of vacated South 158th Street lying easterly of the Sea-Tac Airport Access Freeway; portion of the northeast quarter of the northeast quarter of Section 11, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., in King County, Washington.
